alert.note: Alert for Val Verde (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 15 at 2:18PM CDT until August 16 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of south central Texas, including the following county, Val Verde. * WHEN...From 7 PM CDT this evening through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Tropical moisture will result in numerous showers and thunderstorms training over the same locations of Val Verde county tonight into early Tuesday morning. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Avoid driving where water covers the road, as stalled vehicles put first responders at risk. Turn Around, Don`t Drown!
